title: Bedazzled Nectar
summaries: The Bedazzled Nectar is a pet-summoning item. When used, it summons a Glittery Butterfly pet which flies around the player. It has a chance of being sold by the Traveling Merchant for 1.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a pet butterfly
'Only the best, most exquisite flower excrement!'
statistics.Buy: 1
statistics.Sell: 20
